msbt.message: Have you seen the land I just saw?Do you think it's for sale?<10_4 /> I think it's for sale. <10_4 />If it's for sale, someone will probably buy it, huh?That means someone new would live on the island! And they might know about snacks I don't know about!Oh man, oh man, I'm so excited! New snacks, ! NEW! SNACKS!
I was out for a walk and saw land for sale. I already have some land, but I guess there's more now.Ya know what they say, "Never buy land, they'll just make more of it."
Didja hear? There's some land for sale on the island! That means somebody new will move here soon.I can't wait to meet whoever buys it. I'll show 'em all the good places to smell stuff on the island!
Some land's on sale over there! That means we might get a new snackbuddy real soon.An island fulla snackbuddies That'd be real neat. Just real darn neat, .
Somebody bought the land that was for sale! Someone named, um, uh ? Yeah! That!I can't wait to say hi, and tell my name, and ask about most favorite snack. I'm so excited!

Big news! The biggest! Somebody bought that land that was on sale!Somebody with the name of !Wow! With a name like that, could be an astronautor a secret agentor a snack designer!I can't wait to meet our new neighbor, !
Guess what! Somebody bought that land that was on sale that nobody else had bought yet!Somebody called !I mean, SUPPOSEDLY that's real name. Who knows, !
We got a new friend living here now! Well, they're going to be our friend once we tell them they're our friend!Oh man! Stuff's getting real lively in friendly, old !
Hey, ! Have ya met the new neighbor yet?I'm gonna grab my best snacks and swing on by to say, "Heya! Welcome! Wanna taste this?"I heard once that it's the nicest way to say hello!
Somebody new moved here today! I went to go see 'em, but they were "cleaning house."Anyhoo, I gotta give it a shot some time. I love trying new food and stuff from other cultures, .
Have you talked to the new person who moved here today?I'm gonna talk with them looots! I'm gonna talk to 'em till they're sick of me, and we'll be bestest friends!Off I go, !
's birthday is coming up soon!
's birthday is only a few snacks away!
's birthday is right around the corner, like a hungry shark. Abirthday shark!
The of this month! It's a super real special, darn-neat day that only comes once a year, !
's birthday is coming up soon!
's birthday is only a few snacks away!
's birthday is right around the corner, like a hungry shark. Abirthday shark!
The of next month! We gotta party with everybody, . I'm talkin' everybody!

Tomorrow's 's birthday!<10_4 /> I hope likes my present.I got it for awhile back, then hid it in the floor for the bugs to guard. I got it out, and it was full of bugs!But it's OK.I talked to the bugs about "respect" and "boundaries" and all the other words I hear when I get in trouble!
Tomorrow's 's birthday! <10_4 />Did you get a gift?I thought real hard on it, but I could only think of stuff I want!<10_4 /> I hope likes .

Tomorrow's 's birthday! And tomorrow starts at midnight tonight!So I'm gonna go to place after midnight and start yelling "HAPPY BIRTHDAY!" outside window.Don't let nobody lie to ya. Folks love late night surprises.
Didja hear, ? is moving away tomorrow. says real sad gotta leave. But! real happy I'm gonna keep living here!
is gonna be moving away tomorrow.Some folks say moving away is a total downer. But some folks need to move away!
is moving away. Tomorrow.'s real cool. Cool folks shouldn't leave. They oughta just hang out forever.
's moving today. That makes me sad, man.Ya knowmaybe that's gonna be my superhero name now. "Sad-Man."

Today's the day leaves the island.Do you know manners? What's the right way to say "goodbye"? Or "I'll miss you"? Or"Where'd ya keep your snacks? Are there any crumbs there? And can ya please give me a minute alone?"

Today's the day, 's moving away.It's a shame when a friend leaves too soon. But then somebody new usually shows up, and that's neat.Like Grandma says When one chapter ends, another begins. Unless it's the end of the book.Then ya gotta read a new book so the chapter thing makes sense again.<10_4 /> Yep. That's what she says.
